MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH21 postcode area of Musselburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety due to a faulty electrical equipment at Bellfield court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on for some customers by 12.00pm and the remaining customers will be back on by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.  This message was updated at 08:24am on Wednesday, 16 December 2020
